dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 0013147-250515123054153
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Monaco", "OccurrenceStatus is Present" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 2 records from Bell Museum bryophytes 1 records from Tethys Research Institute aerial survey cetacean sightings 2009-2011 16 records from Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History - Invertebrate Zoology 1 records from J.
